data.text: @TheDohertyInst @UniMelbMDHS @TheRMH @JaalaPulford @ProfSharonLewin Billions of lives depend on a good result. Would have been nice if research was done prior to all the promises and threats though right? #globalexperiment

@TheDohertyInst @JaalaPulford @UniMelbMDHS @TheRMH @ProfSharonLewin So the vaccines are basically still in testing phase. You bastards have been telling people they’re tested and safe, so why the need for these volunteers? I hope you all go to jail for your mandates

@TheDohertyInst @JaalaPulford @UniMelbMDHS @TheRMH @ProfSharonLewin @JaalaPulford not only are you dumb and corrupt but you’re also ugly and my Johnson gets infinitely smaller when I think about how ugly you are inside and out

“Having a diverse range of people donating blood samples will help us to understand how different people respond to vaccines, how long the vaccine provides protection against COVID-19 and the ability of vaccines to protect as new #variants emerge.” @ProfSharonLewin
“We want to enrol people from a diverse range of groups across all ages, including people with prior COVID-19 viral infection and those with underlying health conditions,” @ProfSharonLewin
